translations: 提高……的等级（uprate 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: Lenze has uprated its powerful engineering environment to a considerable degree.
sentences.translation: 伦茨已经对其功能强大的工程环境进行了相当大的升级。

sentences.sentence: Because glass substrates can sustain high toughness and strengh even when they are extremely thin there has been uprated to match the hard-disk technology development.
sentences.translation: 并且玻璃盘基在很薄的情况下依然能保持较好的刚度和硬度，更符合硬盘技术的发展趋势。
